Reviews.Title: “the worst place in amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: jacob r
Reviews.Content: people hotel booked twice chance hotel refund money staff friendly rude dirty expensive bad experience imagine 100 euros night hotel de este

Reviews.Title: “Don't check in before 1 PM”
Reviews.Author: NoelPeek
Reviews.Content: flight 515 am bit problematic told check 1 pm staff leave bags check bit stayed 10 person dorm pretty standard hostel sink showertoilet wasnt kitchen decent free breakfast consists cereal bread spread internet cuts lot wifi free 2 computers guest location museum district bit walk red light district majority touristic spots dont mind walking extended periods time paying 270 euros tram bad id probably stay price

Reviews.Title: “Nice hostel, good value”
Reviews.Author: tdhorne
Reviews.Content: hotel annemarie nice clean hostel located main tram line central station walking distance museums attractions short tram ride entertainment district central amsterdam city walk entire city easily id hiking bit beforehand feeling bit lazy friendly staff clean beds beds bit thin slept fine en suite bath dorm balcony quiet nights sleep day seeing sights

Reviews.Title: “Rude staff, average location”
Reviews.Author: cabsBrisbane
Reviews.Content: friends booked hostel paid extra 6 person ourselves manager unfriendly unhelpful arrived 2 book paying 3 days cash front walk corner 3 atm withdrawals 600 euro required avoid wait friends flights dropping bags 2 occasions employees walked directly using own key knocking time 945 am morning start allocating bunks guests friends staying extra night location pretty average near museum district catch trams dam square central station

Reviews.Title: “Worst Service Ever!!”
Reviews.Author: Carito21
Reviews.Content: england booked amsterdam holidays unfortunately couldnt called cancel booked tell manager hotel rude person talk doesnt solution charged 100 price stolen 200 gbp account book options

Reviews.Title: “I don't understand all the bad reviews”
Reviews.Author: Backpacker14542
Reviews.Content: worried hostel leaving amsterdam due bad reviews listed site found site booking dont fuss arrived welcome amazing fine purpose stayed cheapest 12 person found fine reason fashion bad reviews due name hostel hotel annemarie people booking walking expecting hotel met hostel stress hostel hotel perfect location shops museums coffeeshops supermarket opposite huge concert hall staff helpful leave bags day flight wasnt evening breakfast basic recommend hostel looking hostel looking hotel hotel

Reviews.Title: “Rude and unfriendly hostel”
Reviews.Author: Manicat
Reviews.Content: guy owns hostel rude angry watches time youre polite friendly met shocking level negative attitude feel uncomfortable building stay else

HotelInfo.Name: Annemarie Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Jan Willem Brouwstraat 14, Amsterdam 1071 LJ, The Netherlands
